text: Kvaløysletta is a neighborhood within the city of Tromsø in Tromsø Municipality, located on the eastern shore of the island of Kvaløya. It is situated about 5 kilometers northwest of the city center of Tromsø, and is connected to the island of Tromsøya by the Sandnessund Bridge. The neighborhood has a population of 8,681 people as of 2017, with a population density of 2,782 inhabitants per square kilometer. ==References== Category:Tromsø
title: Kvaløysletta
